text: Calamity () is a 1982 Czechoslovak comedy film directed by Vera Chytilová. == Cast == * Bolek Polívka - Honza Dostál * Dagmar Bláhová - Majka * - Primárka * Marie Pavlíková - Bábicka * - Kveta * Zdeněk Svěrák - Ucitel * Václav Svorc - Nácelník * Bronislav Poloczek - Rezník * Václav Helsus - Strojvedoucí * Zdeněk Dítě - Lesník == References == == External links == * Category:1982 comedy films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czech comedy films Category:Czech films
title: Calamity (film)
